post.title: .NET Blogging
post.content: I’ve been blogging with Front Page as my front end, but it looks like I’m going to have to investigate InfoPath. As .NET blogging tools grow up, I might need to move my site onto ASPNetWeblog or BlogX. I wonder how well these tools support customization. I’ve obviously got more than just blog up on this site.
